name: FLOWER.RAIN
description:
FLOWER.RAIN The Text-Based Adventure Game. "It might not sound like much at first, but trust me, the game is intense." - Real user

You wake up in a facility. It has no name. The Speaker greets you and you start your adventure.

Travel through the dark history of the facility, enjoy the *disgusting* text-based-graphics, and learn to always obey. 

INSTRUCTIONS: Make sure you have a way to run python 3.9.x code, like IDLE. Run it from the Mac Terminal Command Line: python3 FLOWER.RAIN.py

The creators are watching.

we are god.

we created everything.

Prepare yourself.
